rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual information and statistics without employing Q2 cues.
The segment reports statistics but contains no explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser + scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports factual data (historical human cases), not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports numerical metric ('over 700 cases') using standard verbs ('said', 'have been recorded').
